HDG.IM.content: acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche’s wispy Being the guiding conception of Being since early days of his philosophical labor: supports/determines his philosophy from ground up [isn’t that your bias?]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche’s wispy Being the guiding conception of Being since early days of his philosophical labor: supports/determines his philosophy from ground up [isn’t that your bias?]

HDG.IM.content: emptiness of word “Being,” complete withering of its naming force, not just particular case of general abuse of language: the destroyed relation to Being as such [the name?] is real ground for whole misrelation to language [how do you know this if you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet?] [if it is exemplary, what does the particular name matter?]

HDG.BC.content: [beyond philosophy] indefinite title Grundbegriffe: do not commit ourselves to anything in advance [Heidegger opens] > “readiness to put the essence of man at risk in thinking that which grounds this essence,” that which he takes for being [Heidegger closes?]: “whatever grounds everything and gives ground to everything is itself the ground” [causa sui?]

HDG.BC.content: we think toward the ground of everything [do we?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: we think toward the ground of everything [do we?]

HDG.BC.content: knowing, standing, a stance, knowing ground is more originary, more far-reaching [value], more decisive: this knowing is character itself > a claim upon us, exhorted (angesprochen) [addressed] > meleta to pan, “take into care beings as a whole”: always consider the essential, first & last [put last first]

HDG.BC.content: assume the simple attitude (Haltung) that matures [reif zu machen] us for such reflection: suffices for this suggestion to distinguish what humanity, having come to itself, must attend to [why we must attend to ground concepts]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: assume the simple attitude (Haltung) that matures [reif zu machen] us for such reflection: suffices for this suggestion to distinguish what humanity, having come to itself, must attend to [why we must attend to ground concepts]

HDG.BC.content: [on style] Ground-Concepts as demand to reach ground of all that is, of what can therefore be called beings > anticipation of essential (Wesenhaft) more vital (wesentlich) than certainty of calculating the w/out essence (Wesenlos) > thinking in anticipation (Ahnen), for anticipation, essentially more rigorous/exacting than formal-conceptual cleverness of calculable: we must practice such knowing, readiness to make ourselves free for essential

HDG.BC.content: what is thoughtworthy isn’t “thinking” but what challenges thinking, what places thinking in its service, bestows rank/value on it [thinking beyond “logic” as pathos of distance?]: extend thinking toward manner in which ground includes us in its essence, come into proximity w/ what strikes us essential, become aware, listen our way to where we belong [Gelassenheit]

HDG.BC.content: Ground-Concepts: grasping (begreifen) ground of beings as a whole (not mere flashes of insight)
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Ground-Concepts: grasping (begreifen) ground of beings as a whole (not mere flashes of insight)

HDG.BC.content: success [in science] never proof of truth, always “consequence” of a grounding principle that must be questioned, never decided by continually dependent result
HDG.BC.linkedContent: success [in science] never proof of truth, always “consequence” of a grounding principle that must be questioned, never decided by continually dependent result

HDG.BC.content: Being as the groundless, can’t ground our plans on it, no foundation to place whatever we erect, continually gives way, offers no support, the refusal of every expectation (that it could serve as a ground)
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being as the groundless, can’t ground our plans on it, no foundation to place whatever we erect, continually gives way, offers no support, the refusal of every expectation (that it could serve as a ground)

HDG.BC.content: ground is inclusion that gathers out of itself & into itself, a gathering that grants the Open where all beings are [but not causa sui?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: ground is inclusion that gathers out of itself & into itself, a gathering that grants the Open where all beings are [but not causa sui?]

HDG.BC.content: becoming aware of our essential abode in Being: 1st remembrance, impulse to preparation, attending to preparation, preparation for this readiness, readiness for such a change, transformation of humanity re: relation to Being, grasping ground > all this remains preliminary, the preliminary (das Vor-läufige) also an extending-in-advance (ein Voraus-laufen) into a future of history > only initiating/incipient pertains to the future, what is present always is past [slow down] > no haste in incipient, only incipient if it can rest in itself (in sich selbst zu ruhen vermag) [causa sui?], never comes too late, at best too early [Nietzsche]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: becoming aware of our essential abode in Being: 1st remembrance, impulse to preparation, attending to preparation, preparation for this readiness, readiness for such a change, transformation of humanity re: relation to Being, grasping ground > all this remains preliminary, the preliminary (das Vor-läufige) also an extending-in-advance (ein Voraus-laufen) into a future of history > only initiating/incipient pertains to the future, what is present always is past [slow down] > no haste in incipient, only incipient if it can rest in itself (in sich selbst zu ruhen vermag) [causa sui?], never comes too late, at best too early [Nietzsche]

HDG.TB.content: to think Being explicitly: relinquish Being as ground of beings [beyond ground?] in favor of giving which prevails concealed in unconcealment, in favor of the Es Gibt
HDG.TB.linkedContent: to think Being explicitly: relinquish Being as ground of beings [beyond ground?] in favor of giving which prevails concealed in unconcealment, in favor of the Es Gibt

HDG.WM.content: turn away from nothing into beings: hasten into public superficies of our existence > what testifies (zeugt) to manifestation (Offenbarkeit) of nothing in our existence more than negation? > “not (das Nicht)” more original [?] than negation, negating only one way of nihilating (one way of comporting grounded beforehand in in nihilation of nothing) [annihilation is another way?] > “not” becomes manifest only when nihilation of nothing disengaged from concealment: idea of “logic” disintegrates in turbulence of more originary questioning [has this been proven?]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: turn away from nothing into beings: hasten into public superficies of our existence > what testifies (zeugt) to manifestation (Offenbarkeit) of nothing in our existence more than negation? > “not (das Nicht)” more original [?] than negation, negating only one way of nihilating (one way of comporting grounded beforehand in in nihilation of nothing) [annihilation is another way?] > “not” becomes manifest only when nihilation of nothing disengaged from concealment: idea of “logic” disintegrates in turbulence of more originary questioning [has this been proven?]

HDG.WM.content: going beyond beings occurs in essence of Dasein > this going beyond is metaphysics itself—thus, metaphysics belongs to “nature of the human being” > “because the truth of metaphysics dwells in this abyssal ground [hermeneutic circle of Dasein & metaphysics] it stands in closest proximity to the constantly lurking possibility of deepest error” > [but philosophy was born?] the getting under way of metaphysics, the coming to itself of philosophy, to its explicit tasks
HDG.WM.linkedContent: going beyond beings occurs in essence of Dasein > this going beyond is metaphysics itself—thus, metaphysics belongs to “nature of the human being” > “because the truth of metaphysics dwells in this abyssal ground [hermeneutic circle of Dasein & metaphysics] it stands in closest proximity to the constantly lurking possibility of deepest error” > [but philosophy was born?] the getting under way of metaphysics, the coming to itself of philosophy, to its explicit tasks

HDG.WM.content: for philosophy to get underway: 1) allow space for beings as a whole 2) release ourselves into the nothing, liberate ourselves from idols 3) let sweep of our suspense (Schwebens) take its full course, so it swings back to fundamental question of metaphysics [possibility of “why” makes it possible to ground things > destiny of our existence placed in hands of researcher (Forschers) (Nietzsche)] [destiny, question, ground of metaphysics, beyond metaphysics]

HDG.IWM.content: truth of Being called ground, that which nourishes root of tree of philosophy (i.e. metaphysics) > in the ground, roots forget themselves for sake of tree > philosophy doesn’t gather itself upon its ground, always leaves (never escapes) its ground, by means of metaphysics

HDG.IWM.content: thinking that sets out to experience ground of metaphysics, attempt to recall truth of Being > [totally other, beyond Being] from point of view of metaphysics ground appears as ground [cf. 279n Being as nonground (Nichtgrund), X ground], presumably something else experienced in its own terms, something as yet unsaid, something other than metaphysics
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: thinking that sets out to experience ground of metaphysics, attempt to recall truth of Being > [totally other, beyond Being] from point of view of metaphysics ground appears as ground [cf. 279n Being as nonground (Nichtgrund), X ground], presumably something else experienced in its own terms, something as yet unsaid, something other than metaphysics

HDG.IWM.content: fundamental ontology (attempt to inquire back), like any title, soon seen to be inappropriate [beyond Being then?], misleading because says something correct from point of view of metaphysics > what matters is undertaking transition [not there yet] from metaphysics to recalling truth of Being > thinking that calls itself “fundamental ontology” blocks/obscures its own path by very designation > attempt to recall truth of Being, going back into ground of metaphysics [Destruction], already left realm of all ontology w/ 1st step [was that step ever taken?] > wherever indirect/direct representation of “transcendence” remains: ontology [cf. On The Essence of Ground p. 125] [cf. OG pp. 22-3]

HDG.QB.content: essence of human being, “Dasein in human being,” is nothing human [the trace, totally other] > when the idea of human essence grounds everything present (i.e. human authoritative, underlying ground): secures beings in their being, (human essence is the presence that first) permits “representation”

HDG.QB.content: recollective thinking (Andenken) has task of attending to this concealment, in which unconcealment is grounded [how do you know that, if its essence has not yet been revealed?] > recollect not what becomes past: but all enduring (allem Währen) that each case (je) of Ereignis of X Being grants (gewährt)

HDG.FS.content: diapheromenon (of Heraclitus) unfolding (Entfaltung) of contraries, grounded in inapparent character (Unscheinbaren) of logos > opposites exclude, contraries correspond (“Die Gegensätze schliessen einander aus, während die Widerwendigen sich entsprechen”) > [correspond as letting each other reciprocally come forth]

HDG.FS.content: for Kant, ground of everything, only idea (opposed to intuition/concept) of speculative reason, ungrounded, abyssal > Kant witnessed with horror what began to take place w/ Fichte: Fichte & Hegel look for ground where for Kant there’s only abyss

HDG.FS.content: Hegel obstructs access (Zugang) to Greek meaning of being from ground up when he claims Greeks had yet to think subjective as mediation, i.e. as core (Kern) of objectivity > Hegel excludes himself from Greek experience of being as phenomenon
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Hegel obstructs access (Zugang) to Greek meaning of being from ground up when he claims Greeks had yet to think subjective as mediation, i.e. as core (Kern) of objectivity > Hegel excludes himself from Greek experience of being as phenomenon

HDG.FS.content: as Descartes determines ground (Boden) by firmness (Festigkeit) (no longer let ground be as it is from itself), he surrenders the ground, abandons (verlässt) it for sake of firmness [Heidegger rethinking Hegel’s terra firma assessment about Descartes]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: as Descartes determines ground (Boden) by firmness (Festigkeit) (no longer let ground be as it is from itself), he surrenders the ground, abandons (verlässt) it for sake of firmness [Heidegger rethinking Hegel’s terra firma assessment about Descartes]

HDG.FS.content: technology not grounded in physics, physics grounded in essence of technology > [Kant establishes program of program] physics observes nature as succession [series, sequence] of things, not as course of things emerging (hervorgehenden) from each other [like Aristotle]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: technology not grounded in physics, physics grounded in essence of technology > [Kant establishes program of program] physics observes nature as succession [series, sequence] of things, not as course of things emerging (hervorgehenden) from each other [like Aristotle]

HDG.FS.content: man is plaything of technology, positionality (Ge-stell) requires man to correspond w/ exploitation/consumption > cybernetics becomes replacement for philosophy/poetry > modern man a slave to forgetfulness of Being, when disciplines (human sciences) bear no relation to their ground
HDG.FS.linkedContent: man is plaything of technology, positionality (Ge-stell) requires man to correspond w/ exploitation/consumption > cybernetics becomes replacement for philosophy/poetry > modern man a slave to forgetfulness of Being, when disciplines (human sciences) bear no relation to their ground

HDG.FS.content: acc. Heidegger, “categorial intuition” focal point of Husserlian thought > ground of sensuous what Husserl calls hyle, that which affects sensibly, the sense data (blue, black, spatial extension) > along w/ sense data comes the object: object can’t be perceived sensibly (fact that object is object doesn’t arise from sensuous intuition)

Heidegger, “categorial intuition” focal point of Husserlian thought > ground of sensuous what Husserl calls hyle, that which affects sensibly, the sense data (blue, black, spatial extension) > along w/ sense data comes the object: object can’t be perceived sensibly (fact that object is object doesn’t arise from sensuous intuition)

HDG.FS.content: to unfold question of meaning of Being, Being must be given > Husserl succeeded in this making present of Being, phenomenally present in category > Husserl gave Heidegger ground: “being” no mere concept, no pure abstraction > Husserl doesn’t inquire forth into Being after reaching Being as given, doesn’t ask what it means > no question for Husserl, “being” means being-object (but objectivity is a mode of presence)

HDG.MA.content: only a ground for growth can lie fallow > expressway, where nothing grows, can’t be fallow [cf. Accursed Share, Bataille, restricted economy]
HDG.MA.linkedContent: only a ground for growth can lie fallow > expressway, where nothing grows, can’t be fallow [cf. Accursed Share, Bataille, restricted economy]

HDG.MA.content: truly joyous/salutary work, “artist must be able to mount from the depth of his home ground up into the ether”
HDG.MA.linkedContent: truly joyous/salutary work, “artist must be able to mount from the depth of his home ground up into the ether”

HDG.MA.content: Nobel prize winners declare “Science is a road to a happier human life” > this statement as far as possible from reflective insight into our age, forget to ponder/ask: what is ground that enabled modern technology to discover/set free new energies in nature? > nature has become a “gigantic gasoline station” [Ge-stell] (technical epoch developed in 17th century Europe)

HDG.MA.content: if Gelassenheit awakens in us, arrive at path that will lead to new ground: in that ground, creativity that produces lasting works could strike new roots
HDG.MA.linkedContent: if Gelassenheit awakens in us, arrive at path that will lead to new ground: in that ground, creativity that produces lasting works could strike new roots

HDG.DL.content: transformation (Verwandlung) of thinking occurs as a passage (Wanderung), one site left for another, sites placed in discussion (Erörterung), one site (Ort) is metaphysics, the other we leave w/out a name [overcoming metaphysics] > in leaving behind metaphysics, Heidegger leaves behind aesthetics grounded in metaphysics: in such a way that we can give thought to nature of aesthetics, direct it back (verweisen) w/in its boundaries

HDG.LP.content: the indeterminacy of man [via Trakl] means man is all too firmly confirmed as factum (Tatsache) [factical life], not yet been gathered/brought (gebracht) to firm ground (Feste), “home,” in das Einheimische ihres verhüllten Wesens > Western-European metaphysics may be struggling in vain, its way to the Unterwegs may be blocked: modern man is the animal not yet determined (fest-gestellte Tier) in its nature

HDG.WL.content: Heidegger comments on risk of calling Sprachwesen Saying, might we be elevating language to a fantastical, self-sustained being (Wesen) that can’t be encountered > but language is bound up w/ human speaking, needs human speaking > perhaps we miss the very nature of language when we ask after grounds > or is Sage: the abode of rest (Be-Ruhende), grants the quiet of mutual belonging to all w/in Gefüge des Sprachwesens?

HDG.WL.content: showing prevails in Saying, even in everything that waits for us unspoken > Saying not linguistic expression added to phenomenon: all radiant appearance/fading away grounded (beruht) in showing Saying > Saying pervades (durchwaltet)/structures (fügt) openness of clearing (das Freie der Lichtung) that every appearance must seek & every disappearance must leave behind, in which all present/absent being must show/say/announce itself > Saying: the gathering that joins all appearance (alles Scheinen fügende Versammlung), lets all that shows abide w/in itself, the in-itself manifold showing

HDG.EC.content: morally grounded world order will not ward off (gebannt) or end process of devastation > no matter the measures man takes, malice may remain Grundzug of Being
HDG.EC.linkedContent: morally grounded world order will not ward off (gebannt) or end process of devastation > no matter the measures man takes, malice may remain Grundzug of Being

HDG.EC.content: doesn’t this thought that Being is malicious (bösartig) in the Ground of its essence (im Grunde seines Wesens) place an awful demand (arge Zumutung) on human thinking? > even more when one should not regard the idea that evil dwells in essence of Being as pessimistic > that thinking should be easy is a thought from spirit of devastation [spirit of revenge?]

HDG.EC.content: withdrawal of human existence from ground of thinking, burning pain, we were not permitted to be there for the unnecessary, couldn’t be young [not there in ontic]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: withdrawal of human existence from ground of thinking, burning pain, we were not permitted to be there for the unnecessary, couldn’t be young [not there in ontic]

HDG.EC.content: [facetiously?] what’s more necessary than “getting down to businesses with the given facts (Zupacken im Gegebenen), remaking what is present at hand, and moving forward w/ what has existed before (Vorwärtsbringen des Bisherigen)”? > that factual sense of reality (Tatsachensinn) lets man stand squarely on ground, validates, secures, effectuates (wirken), holds fast—and yet can’t be w/out the unnecessary (Unnötige)
